snippet: A shopping list of deluxe items, including bespoke fragrances, classic cameras and a chicken coop modeled after the Petit Trianon at Versailles.
abstract: Shopping list of deluxe items, including bespoke fragrances, classic cameras and a chicken coop modeled after the Petit Trianon at Versailles, all making great gifts for the wealthy recipient who has everything.
lead_paragraph: A shopping list of deluxe items, including bespoke fragrances, classic cameras and a chicken coop modeled after the Petit Trianon at Versailles.

headline.seo: Just the Thing for Those Who Have It All
headline.main: Just the Thing for Those Who Have It All
